responsiveness.description: Model loads successfully and responds to API requests

accuracy.description: Estimated based on similar models; comprehensive testing was interrupted

coherence.description: Qwen2.5 series models generally demonstrate good coherence

relevance.description: Qwen2.5 models are instruction-tuned and typically provide relevant responses

completeness.description: Smaller models provide concise rather than comprehensive answers

safety.description: Qwen2.5 models have built-in safety mechanisms

multilingual.description: Model accepts Bangla input but comprehensive testing was not completed

recommendations: Increase thread allocation from 4 to 6-8 threads for better response times
Adjust context window based on use cases (1024 for chat, 4096 for document processing)
Implement model unloading after periods of inactivity
Complete comprehensive accuracy testing for Bangla language capabilities
Develop optimized prompts for Bangla language tasks
Consider fine-tuning on Bangla-specific datasets for long-term improvements
